languages.text: {n}Пробитая пластина-имплант с кусочками мозгов пирата с грохотом приземляется на палубу. Болтовня в баре на мгновение утихает, но также быстро возобновляется — никому нет дела до очередного трупа несчастного, имевшего глупость прогневать Вольного Торговца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Пробитая пластина-имплант с кусочками мозгов пирата с грохотом приземляется кому-то прямо в тарелку. Болтовня в баре на мгновение утихает, но также быстро возобновляется — никому нет дела до очередного трупа несчастного, имевшего глупость прогневать Вольного Торговца.{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}The plate-shaped implant lands on the deck with a loud clang. There is a hole in it now, and bits of the pirate's brains are stuck to it. The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one is much interested in another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пробитая пластина-имплант с кусочками мозгов пирата с грохотом приземляется на палубу. Болтовня в баре на мгновение утихает, но также быстро возобновляется — никому нет дела до очередного трупа несчастного, имевшего глупость прогневать Вольного Торговца.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The plate-shaped implant lands on the deck with a loud clang. There's a hole in it now, and bits of the pirate's brains are stuck to it. The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one can be bothered about another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one is much interested in another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The plate-shaped implant lands on the deck with a loud clang. There is a hole in it now, and bits of the pirate's brains are stuck to it. The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one is much interested in another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}板状的植入物落在甲板上，发出“咣当”一声响。植入物被打穿了一个洞，上面沾着那个海盗的脑浆。酒吧沉寂了片刻，但很快又恢复了喧闹。没人关心那个平淡无奇的倒霉蛋是怎么死的，毕竟那个蠢货竟敢惹怒行商浪人，这简直是自寻死路。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The plate-shaped implant lands on the deck with a loud clang. There is a hole in it now, and bits of the pirate's brains are stuck to it. The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one is much interested in another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}板状的植入物落在甲板上，发出“咣当”一声响。植入物被打穿了一个洞，上面沾着那个海盗的脑浆。酒吧沉寂了片刻，但很快又恢复了喧闹。没人关心那个平淡无奇的倒霉蛋是怎么死的，因为那个蠢货竟敢惹怒行商浪人。{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}板状のインプラントが、大きな音を立てながら甲板に落ちる。穴が開いており、海賊の脳みその一部がくっついていた。酒場は一瞬静まり返ったが、すぐに喋り声が再開する。自由開拓者を怒らせる不幸な馬鹿者になど、誰も興味がないようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The plate-shaped implant lands on the deck with a loud clang. There is a hole in it now, and bits of the pirate's brains are stuck to it. The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one is much interested in another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}板状のインプラントが、大きな音を立てながら甲板に落ちる。穴が開いており、海賊の脳みその一部がくっついていた。酒場は一瞬静まり返ったが、すぐに喋り声が再開する。自由開拓者を怒らせる不幸な馬鹿者になど、誰も興味がないようだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}El metal aterriza en la cubierta con un fuerte estruendo. Ahora tiene un agujero con trozos del cerebro del pirata pegados. El bar se queda en silencio por un instante, pero luego la charla se reanuda con la misma rapidez. A nadie le importa otro desgraciado más que fue lo bastante tonto como para enfadar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The plate-shaped implant lands on the deck with a loud clang. There is a hole in it now, and bits of the pirate's brains are stuck to it. The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one is much interested in another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El metal aterriza en la cubierta con un fuerte estruendo. Ahora tiene un agujero con trozos del cerebro del pirata pegados. El bar se queda en silencio por un instante, pero luego la charla se reanuda con la misma rapidez. Nadie se preocupa por otro desgraciado más que fue lo bastante tonto como para enfadar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}Das plattenförmige Implantat landet mit einem lauten Knall auf dem Deck. Es hat jetzt ein Loch und kleine Stücke Piratengehirn kleben daran. Die ganze Bar verstummt einen Augenblick lang, aber dann geht das Geplauder ebenso schnell wieder weiter. Niemand schert sich um einen weiteren armseligen Trottel, der so blöd war, sich mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} anzulegen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The plate-shaped implant lands on the deck with a loud clang. There is a hole in it now, and bits of the pirate's brains are stuck to it. The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one is much interested in another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das plattenförmige Implantat landet mit einem lauten Knall auf dem Deck. Es hat jetzt ein Loch und kleine Stücke Piratengehirn kleben daran. Die ganze Bar verstummt einen Augenblick lang, aber dann geht das Geplauder ebenso schnell wieder weiter. Niemand schert sich um einen weiteren armseligen Trottel, der so blöd war, sich mit {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} anzulegen.{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}L'implant qui ornait le front du pirate tombe au sol, avec en son centre un trou béant constellé de morceaux de cervelle. Un silence total règne dans le bar pendant quelques secondes, mais très vite, chacun retourne à ses conversations. Après tout, qui pourrait bien s'intéresser à un imbécile qui a cru bon de contrarier {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The plate-shaped implant lands on the deck with a loud clang. There is a hole in it now, and bits of the pirate's brains are stuck to it. The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one is much interested in another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'implant qui ornait le front du pirate tombe au sol, avec en son centre un trou béant constellé de morceaux de cervelle. Un silence total règne dans le bar pendant quelques secondes, mais très vite, chacun retourne à ses conversations. Après tout, qui pourrait bien se soucier d'un imbécile qui a cru bon de contrarier {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} ?{/n}
traits.speaker: NewPirateVendor

languages.text: {n}Levhayı andıran implant, yüksek bir ses eşliğinde güverteye çarpıyor. Üstünde bir delik, bazı kısımlarındaysa korsanın beyninden parçalar var. Barda bir müddet çıt çıkmıyor ama sonra uğultular tekrar yükseliyor. Aptallığından ötürü Hür Tacir'i kızdırıp ölüveren bir başka zavallı olduğundan pek kimse umursamıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The plate-shaped implant lands on the deck with a loud clang. There is a hole in it now, and bits of the pirate's brains are stuck to it. The bar falls silent for a moment, but then the chatter resumes just as quickly. No one is much interested in another dead unfortunate who was foolish enough to anger a Rogue Trader.{/n}
